name: dsid

body.origin:
|- wceq(cds, cslot(cfv(cds, cnx)))
-| wceq(cds, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat2)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ dist = Slot((dist ` ndx))
⊣ dist = Slot(cdc(1, 2))
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ

-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ dist = Slot((dist ` ndx))
⊣ dist = Slot(cdc(1, 2))
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cds, cslot(cfv(cds, cnx)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)
